Jark

blog code group

why jark
start
namespace
packages
classpath
docs
editors
scripting
vm
resources
wishlist
git log
 A tool to manage classpaths and clojure namespaces on a persistent JVM

Resource and links

Blog: http://icylisper.in/clojure/jark.html
Mailing list: https://groups.google.com/group/clojure-jark

Available Modules

cljr    - reload add
cp      - list add run
doc     - search examples comments
if      - cli cli-json
ns      - find list load repl run
package - install uninstall versions describe deps search installed latest
repo    - list add remove
self    - install uninstall version about
swank   - start stop
vm      - start stop threads stat uptime
